QuestData.Title: A United Front
QuestData.Description:
Our rebel fighters have been armed and morale is high - even the Alliance and Horde elves have ceased their squabbling.
We are nearly ready to march on the city.
Hand out this week's fruit, and then we can begin preparations.
QuestData.LogDescription: Feed the Fruit of the Arcan'dor to a Suramar Refugee in Shal'Aran.
